about_the_game:
With its vibrant colors, intricate details, and adorable creatures, this game is perfect for animal lovers of all ages. So gather your friends and family and get ready to assemble these stunning puzzles to bring the zoo to life!

Puzzle Images

Count: 50

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: 2014 or newer Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB+ Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Assemble images of your favorite creatures, including lions, elephants, giraffes, monkeys and more. Get ready for a challenging and enjoyable experience!
